ParticlesSystem

Class Particle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ParticlesSystem.Particle
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FreeParticle, GridParticle

    public abstract class Particle
extends java.lang.Object
    A particle is a little 2D circle in a mechanical system.
